title: Who Need's a Story When you Have Draaaaven
body:
Draven woke at his usual time, whenever he liked. The world would wait for him. 
However he knew time was nearing, when the League of Draaaven would call upon him to show off his skills. He knew today would be another Draven of a day. Afterwards, who cared, the world would admire him wherever he ventured. 
'Places to go, me to see', and with that he was off.
